text: Leopold Victor "Leo" Rucka (August 18, 1931 - January 4, 2016) was an American professional football player. He played as a linebacker for the San Francisco 49ers of the National Football League (NFL) in 1956. He was born in Wooster, Baytown, Texas. Rucka died on January 4, 2016 in Crosby, Texas, aged 84. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Leo Rucka
